name: Infatex.com
overview:
Infatex has been known to help its clients attract more customers and enhance their online presence by adopting a comprehensive approach. The end goal of such an approach is to help the clients increase their profits. To ensure that clients can achieve this goal, Infatex provides a wide array of services. Such services include designing a media campaign that is complete from ground up and improving a client’s current marketing campaign.

Infatex was set up by a team of highly qualified Internet marketing professionals with more than 15 years experience in the business. At present, it is one of the fastest growing Internet marketing company, with branches located in San Diego, California and Saint Petersburg, Russia. Since inception, we have been involved in several Internet advertising campaigns that showcased our superior capability in all aspects of website development.

Infatex is comprised of a top-notch lineup of web developers, web designers, online marketing professionals and copywriters. The company also has its own support and sales personnel. This is done with the aim of bridging the gap that normally exists between the providers and consumers. Each and very client that Infatex serves is dealt with in a highly professional manner. Additionally, each account that we hold is handled according to the specifications and unique needs of the account holder. Customer satisfaction is our top priority and that is why excellent communication with our customers is fostered at all times.
